sourcesContent:
<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      notifications: [],
      selectedNotification: null,
    };
  },
  created() {
    this.loadNotices();
  },
  methods: {
    // 加载教务通知
    loadNotices() {
      this.$request.get("/notice/selectAll").then((res) => {
        if (res.code === "200") {
          // 假设响应数据中的日期字段为 "date"
          this.notifications = res.data.map(notification => {
            return {
              ...notification,
              // 如果有时间格式不一致的情况，可以在此处格式化
              formattedDate: this.formatDate(notification.date)
            };
          });
        } else {
          this.$message.error(res.msg);
        }
      });
    },

    // 查看通知详情
    viewNotification(notification) {
      this.selectedNotification = { ...notification };
    },

    // 返回到通知列表
    backToList() {
      this.selectedNotification = null;
    },

    // Format the date and time for display
    formatDate(dateString) {
      const date = new Date(dateString);
      return date.toLocaleString();
    },
  },
};
</script>



<style scoped>
.container {
  font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
  padding: 20px;
  background-color: #f4f4f4;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.title {
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 2rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  color: #333;
}

.notification-list {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.notification-item {
  background-color: #fff;
  padding: 15px;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  cursor: pointer;
}

.notification-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.notification-title {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #333;
}

.notification-date {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: #888;
}

.notification-content {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.notification-detail {
  background-color: #fff;
  padding: 20px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.detail-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.back-btn {
  padding: 8px 16px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  background-color: #007bff;
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.detail-title {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.detail-content {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .container {
    padding: 10px;
  }

  .notification-title {
    font-size: 1rem;
  }

  .notification-date {
    font-size: 0.8rem;
  }

  .notification-content {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
  }
}
</style>
